summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Hillclimb Corridor in the Pike Project (Wash. R-17); authorizing an agreement with Joe Bakun and Irene Bakun, his wife; Andrew Bakun, Jr. and Jeanette C. Bakun, his wife; and Anton AltHoff and Millie Althoff, his wife; owners of portions of Lots 1 and 2, Block 175, Seattle Tidelands, consenting upon certain terms and conditions to the elimination of vehicular traffic from that portion of Pike Street abutting.
